DOC.brief_summary: The Precious study likely help determine frequency ( percentage ) subclinical hypothyroidism among pregnant woman Pakistan It also help determine risk factor develop subclinical hypothyroidism pregnancy
DOC.brief_title: The Prevalence Sub Clinical Hypothyroidism During Early Pregnancy Pakistan
DOC.criteria: Subjects must meet follow criterion enrol study Patient 1845 year age ; pregnant First Trimester Patient willing give blood sample laboratory test Patient willing provide write authorization obtain data study Patients suffer Chronic Cardiac Disease Chronic Cardiac Failure , Cardiac Arrhythmia Hepatic Disorder : Cirrhosis Renal Disease : Patients dialysis Transplant Therapy Respiratory Disorder Subjects history nonthyroid malignancy Patient currently take medication hyperthyroidism Active systemic infection Patient physical mental impairment Patients systemic steroid therapy lithium therapy Patients second third trimester pregnancy Patient willing give blood sample laboratory test Patient willing provide write authorization obtain data study
